body:
Comment 2: 
if the code is executed under win, then the Separator should already be = "\\", thus the
last call in Clean() -> FromSlash(vol + string(buf[0:w])) should have converted all "/"
to "\\". No? Are you saying there will be a Separator reevaluation b/w the path.Clean()
call and the outer wrapping filepath.FromSlash()?
